item.title: Setup Your Own Git Server on RaspberryPi
item.description: To setup a local git server on a RaspberryPi, the procedure is actually very simple. You need following things configured on the system on which you are setting up the git server. SSH needs to be enabled. git-core needs to be installed. git repo needs to be initialized. This repo will be cloned and mentained.
